question: Which international sports organisation has launched an online tool 'Road to Tokyo'?
explanation:
Monaco-based World Athletics has launched 'Road to Tokyo', an online tool to track the qualification process for next year's Olympic Games.
The Tokyo Olympics were postponed in March and is scheduled to be held from July 23 to August 8, 2021. The qualification system is adapted to fit in the new dates of the games. The online tool will provide a real time view of each event during the Tokyo 2020 qualification period which ends on June 29, 2021.
